lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Nick Mira/Abel Tesfaye/Cody Rounds/Danny L Snodgrass/Jarad Higgins
[00:01.000] 作词 : Nick Mira/Abel Tesfaye/Cody Rounds/Danny L Snodgrass/Jarad Higgins
[00:11.255] I'd do anything in my power to see you just smile
[00:17.523] I want you to prosper, and come proper
[00:20.740] Even if that means I ain't by your side
[00:23.546] I'd do anything in my power to see you just smile
[00:29.655] I want you to prosper, and come proper
[00:32.729] Even if that means I ain't by your side
[00:35.796] Devil on my shoulder tellin' me I'll die soon
[00:39.412] I don't really want that to impact you
[00:42.377] But I don't know, maybe I'm just paranoid
[00:44.561] I just want the best for you, I just want what's left of you
[00:47.669] Ho, you tell me that you're sad inside
[00:50.450] I'm sad that I can't satisfy
[00:53.422] Yeah, I pray that I get it right this time
[00:56.537] Maybe we'll be alright
[00:59.897] Ho, you tell me that you're sad inside
[01:02.430] I'm sad that I can't satisfy
[01:05.331] Yeah, I pray that I get it right this time
[01:08.868] Maybe we'll be alright
[01:11.837] I'd do anything in my power to see you just smile
[01:18.228] I want you to prosper, and come proper
[01:21.222] Even if that means I ain't by your side
[01:24.141] I'd do anything in my power to see you just smile
[01:30.238] I want you to prosper, and come proper
[01:33.309] Even if that means I ain't by your side
[01:36.354] Ah yeah
[01:37.977] I just want to see you smile (You smile)
[01:40.794] Don't cry (Don't cry)
[01:42.365] Even though it means I gotta let you go (You go)
[01:45.539] Depending on you, gotta learn to be alone (Lone)
[01:49.982] 'Cause I'm so desensitized
[01:54.827] When our skin is touching (Yeah), I need drugs to love you (Yeah)
[01:57.945] You want so much more from me, but I can only **** you (You)
[02:02.236] I spent everyday right beside you (Side you), side you (Side you)
[02:06.873] A hundred pics of me on your phone
[02:10.245] Now you're someone that I used to know
[02:14.503] At this point, we playing with fire (Fire), fire (Fire)
[02:19.303] You don't wanna see what's in my phone
[02:21.995] It's just gonna hurt you more (More)
[02:24.299] I'd do anything in my power to see you just smile (Ooh yeah)
[02:30.873] I want you to prosper, and come proper
[02:33.838] Even if that means I ain't by your side (Oh, oh)
[02:36.795] I'd do anything in my power (My power) to see you just smile
[02:42.927] I want you to prosper, and come proper
[02:45.768] Even if that means I ain't by your side
tlyric:
[by:Klay137]
[00:11.255]我会尽我全力 只为博君一笑
[00:17.523]愿你获得成功 得到应有回报
[00:20.740]即使那意味着我不再伴你身旁
[00:23.546]我会尽我全力 只为博君一笑
[00:29.655]愿你获得成功 得到应有回报
[00:32.729]即使那意味着我不再伴你身旁
[00:35.796]肩上伫立的恶魔告诉我大限将至
[00:39.412]我真的不想因为此噩耗而影响你
[00:42.377]但真相难以寻找 也许只是我过度焦虑
[00:44.561]我想看到你最好的自己 那留在你心中的本质
[00:47.669]你告诉我 你内心空洞 伤心欲绝
[00:50.450]而我也暗自伤神 因为无法满足你的需求
[00:53.422]但这次请上天保佑 我一定能抓住机遇
[00:56.537]也许我俩都会安然无恙
[00:59.897]妹子 你告诉我你内心伤心欲绝
[01:02.430]而我也暗自伤神 因为无法满足你的需求
[01:05.331]但这次请上天保佑 我一定能抓住机遇
[01:08.868]也许我俩都会安然无恙
[01:11.837]我会尽我全力 只为博君一笑
[01:18.228]愿你获得成功 得到应有回报
[01:21.222]即使那意味着我不再伴你身旁
[01:24.141]我会尽我全力 只为博君一笑
[01:30.238]愿你获得成功 得到应有回报
[01:33.309]即使那意味着我不再伴你身旁
[01:36.354]盆栽登场
[01:37.977]我只想看到你露出笑容
[01:40.794]别再泪如雨下
[01:42.365]即使这代表着我们天人两隔
[01:45.539]取决于你 要习惯未来孤独的一生
[01:49.982]因为我如此冷漠
[01:54.827]当我们肌肤触碰时 我需要药物才能将你爱到极致
[01:57.945]你要的不仅仅是这些 但我只能与你纵享鱼水之欢
[02:02.236]不论白天还是黑夜 随时随地我都与你紧伴身旁
[02:06.873]你手机中存着成千上百我的照片
[02:10.245]而现在 我们不过是陌生人罢了
[02:14.503]此时此刻 我们正在玩火自焚
[02:19.303]你不会想要看到我手机里的聊天记录的
[02:21.995]因为那只会更加残忍的伤害你
[02:24.299]我会尽我全力 只为博君一笑
[02:30.873]愿你获得成功 得到应有回报
[02:33.838]即使那意味着我不再伴你身旁
[02:36.795]我会尽我全力 只为博君一笑
[02:42.927]愿你获得成功 得到应有回报
[02:45.768]即使那意味着我不再伴你身旁
